articles.title: What’s New in VALORANT Episode 5 Act II
articles.description: Join the Champions celebration in and out of the game.

articles.title: YOUR MOMENT // Episode 5: Act II Kickoff - VALORANT
articles.description: The second act of DIMENSION is here—ready to turn some heads? Clutch like a champ with new VCT Champions 2022 cosmetics, claim some new legendary Battlepass items, and prove yourself in a fresh Ranked Act.

articles.title: VALORANT Patch Notes 5.04
articles.description: Don’t forget! It’s also the start of Episode 5 Act II.

articles.title: RITUAL COMPLETE // Reaver Skinline Trailer - VALORANT
articles.description: Reaver’s back and bringing you some sinister new Phantom, Karambit Melee, Ghost, Spectre, and Odin skins.

articles.title: VALORANT Patch Notes 5.03
articles.description: You want to play? Let’s play with Chamber’s balance.

articles.title: VALORANT Patch Notes 5.01
articles.description: Phoenix, KAY/O, and Yoru on on the balance beams and some updated smurf detection.

articles.title: DIVE IN // Episode 5: Act I Kickoff - VALORANT
articles.description: Dive into Pearl, VALORANT’s first Omega Earth map, alongside skins from the abyss, a brand new Battlepass, and a Ranked Act reset.

articles.title: What’s New in VALORANT Episode 5 Act I
articles.description: Submerge yourself with all that comes at the start of Episode 5.

articles.title: VALORANT Patch Notes 5.0
articles.description: New map, new rank, new Episode.

articles.title: VALORANT Map Pool Changes
articles.description: Split is leaving the Competitive and Unrated map rotation temporarily.

articles.title: Dia do Santuário // Pearl Official Map Reveal - VALORANT
articles.description: Join us for Dia do Santuário–a celebration of PEARL: The wonder beneath the waves.

articles.title: VALORANT Patch Notes 4.11
articles.description: New “clutch mute” system and loads of Agent bug fixes.

articles.title: VALORANT Agent Insights: Fade
articles.description: Nazar değmesin.

articles.title: VALORANT Patch Notes 4.10
articles.description: Quality of life Agent fixes, Haven tweaks, and changes that should help VALORANT feel more consistent.

articles.title: VALORANT Gameplay Consistency Update 2
articles.description: The VALORANT Gameplay team shares a follow up on their look into game-to-game consistency.

articles.title: From the Archives: The Sting Audio Logs // VALORANT
articles.description: Jump back in time and hear the story you may have missed around the operation to capture Fade.

articles.title: VALORANT Patch Notes 4.09
articles.description: Out of PBE and into Patch 4.09—it’s a Chamber nerf.

articles.title: VALORANT Patch Notes 4.08
articles.description: Fade haunts! Also, Jett, Neon and Sova are on the workbench, and tweaks to 5-stack Rank Rating penalties.

articles.title: Fade Gameplay Reveal Trailer // VALORANT
articles.description: Get ready to face your fears.

articles.title: İYİ GECELER - Fade Agent Trailer // VALORANT
articles.description: Go ahead, try to hide.

articles.title: VALORANT Jett Changes for Patch 4.08
articles.description: The dashes, they are a changin.

articles.title: VALORANT Gameplay Consistency Update
articles.description: The VALORANT Gameplay team shares the latest on their look into game-to-game consistency.

articles.title: VALORANT Patch Notes 4.07
articles.description: Bulldog and Stinger input updates, new AFK detections, and more servers.

articles.title: GO WIDE // Widejoy Mode Announcement Trailer- VALORANT
articles.description: Go wide, or get out.

articles.title: VALORANT Patch Notes 4.05
articles.description: Brimmy with the stimmy is adjusted, you can import your crosshairs, and map queue updates.

articles.title: Deep Dive Into 4.04 Controller Agents Changes
articles.description: Our Controller Agents got an overhaul in Patch 4.04. Our designers walk you through the hows and whys for each.

articles.title: Deep Dive Into Icebox 4.04 Changes
articles.description: A revamp of Icebox is part of the foundational work for Episode 4 Act II.

articles.title: LET’S GO.  // Episode 4: Act II Kickoff - VALORANT
articles.description: Ready or not, Act II of Episode 4: DISRUPTION is here.

articles.title: VALORANT Patch Notes 4.04
articles.description: Yoru is back, Controllers are reshaped, and Icebox gets a few walls knocked down.

articles.title: VALORANT Patch Notes 4.03
articles.description: Last patch before Act II, and we’re already looking to improve performance, Deathmatch and Agent bugs.

articles.title: VALORANT Patch Notes 4.02
articles.description: This performance-focused patch also targets AFK detection improvements.

articles.title: Unlock the Wayfinder Shorty with Prime Gaming
articles.description: This article will not be visible on the playvalorant website, but will be used in the VALORANT in-client news tile to link out to the redemption page for the March Amazon Prime Drop.

articles.title: Multi-Factor Authentication Has Arrived
articles.description: Protect your account and information with our new MFA system.

articles.title: VALORANT Patch Notes 4.01
articles.description: Muted Word list added, bug fixes, and updates to the Ares.

articles.title: What’s New in VALORANT Episode 4 Act I
articles.description: A quick disruption to the new year, with Act I Battlepass, Neon, and the Protocol skinline.

articles.title: VALORANT Patch Notes 4.0
articles.description: Neon charges her way in, as well as multiple weapon changes, and reworks on Breeze and Bind.

articles.title: Set. It. Off.  // Episode 4: Act 1 Kickoff - VALORANT
articles.description: Welcome to the first Act of Episode 4: DISRUPTION.

articles.title: Spark - Neon Agent Trailer // VALORANT
articles.description: Neon, VALORANT’s newest Manila-born Agent, touches down with Episode 4: Disruption.

articles.title: Unlock the Bruno Coin Spray with Prime Gaming
articles.description: This article will not be visible on the playvalorant website, but will be used in the VALORANT in-client news tile to link out to the redemption page for the March Amazon Prime Drop.

articles.title: VALORANT Patch Notes 3.12
articles.description: Agent-specific keybinds. That is all.

articles.title: VALORANT Game and Network Instability Basics
articles.description: We’re here to help you understand those instability icons you may see from time to time.

articles.title: VALORANT Patch Notes 3.10
articles.description: Chamber arrives, updated Esports features, and the 5-stack returns to the Competitive queue.

articles.title: New Undercity Nights missions on RiotxArcane.com
articles.description: The World of RiotX Arcane heads towards its conclusion with new missions and in-game rewards.

articles.title: Progress Days missions on RiotxArcane.com are live
articles.description: The World of RiotX Arcane is changing. Visit new districts, complete missions & get in-game rewards.

articles.title: VALORANT Patch Notes 3.09
articles.description: The new Act brings changes to the Classic, Fracture, and more features for Observers.

articles.title: VALORANT Episode 3 Act III Agent Delay
articles.description: Some news about the timing of our next Agent release.

articles.title: Unlock the Flames in my Veins Spray with Prime Gaming
articles.description: This article will not be visible on the playvalorant website, but will be used in the VALORANT in-client news tile to link out to the redemption page for the March Amazon Prime Drop.

articles.title: The Origins of VALORANT’s Nunca Olvidados
articles.description: Join Sammi Pedregon as she opens the book on the life of the Día de los Muertos-inspired weapon skins.

articles.title: VALORANT Patch Notes 3.08
articles.description: There is no balance, only Zuul.

articles.title: VALORANT Anti-cheat: Fall 2021 Update
articles.description: Anti-cheat team brings the updates on cheaters in VALORANT Episode 3.

articles.title: VALORANT Patch Notes 3.07
articles.description: Quality of Life changes for Viper and Jett, a beta rollout of a new setting for device input, and more.

articles.title: Unlock the Just Business Spray with Prime Gaming
VALORANT Patch Notes 3.06
articles.description: KAY/O, Skye, and Jett are on the balance block. Five maps get some stronger crates for safer planting.

articles.title: Turn up the Pressure // New VALORANT Act Kickoff Trailer
articles.description: Turn up the pressure during Episode 3 Act II. Catch a glimpse at what’s in store with this kickoff trailer.

articles.title: VALORANT Patch Notes 3.05
articles.description: Episode 3 Act 2 goes live! Ability damage updates for three Agents, Rank distribution tweaks, and new Bonus XP.

articles.title: What’s New in VALORANT Episode 3 Act II
articles.description: This Act brings our seventh map, a first-time skin collab, and another Battlepass collection to cop.

articles.title: Uncover Fracture // Official Map Teaser - VALORANT
articles.description: Explore a world divided on Fracture, a new VALORANT map coming in Reflection, Act II.

articles.title: VALORANT Patch Notes 3.04
articles.description: This patch makes it easier on observers, updating a number of esports features and gameplay tech updates.

articles.title: Regional Price Changes and Global Bonus Currency
articles.description: We’re updating pricing in some regions on September 8th.

articles.title: VALORANT Patch Notes 3.03
articles.description: A big Viper bug fix, new crosshair settings, and network updates.

articles.title: VALORANT Patch Notes 3.02
articles.description: More bug fixes as we continue to evaluate the hefty Patch 3.0 changes.

articles.title: VALORANT Patch Notes 3.01
articles.description: As the 3.0 dust settles, our devs do some bug clean up.

articles.title: Unlock the Nice Smile Gun Buddy with Prime Gaming
articles.description: Unlock the Nice Smile Gun Buddy with Prime Gaming

articles.title: VALORANT Patch Notes 3.0
articles.description: Pretty much everything gets a change or two. Agents, Weapons, Competitive, performance—it just keeps going.

articles.title: VALORANT Account Leveling Explained
articles.description: A new way to track and display your time playing VALORANT.

articles.title: What’s New in VALORANT Episode 3 Act I
articles.description: KAY/O arrives, two Battlepasses, Account Leveling, and more YR1 events.

articles.title: KAY/O Agent Reveal Trailer - VALORANT
articles.description: Shut down your opponents with robotic precision when VALORANT’s newest agent, KAY/O, boots up with Episode 3.

articles.title: VALORANT Patch Notes 2.11
articles.description: The calm before the Episode 3 storm. Some bug and performance updates.

articles.title: UPDATE ON VALORANT MODES ROTATION
articles.description: Our Modes producer is here to update you on where Modes is headed after Escalation.

articles.title: VALORANT Patch Notes 2.09
articles.description: Viper’s instant decay is nerfed, tactical timeouts for custom games, and Replication game mode goes live.

articles.title: NEW VALORANT MODE: REPLICATION
articles.description: Pick one Agent for all your tactical needs in Replication, the new VALORANT game mode.

articles.title: Updating the Privacy Notice and Terms of Service
articles.description: We’re updating our player policies to implement a global refund policy and improve our behavior systems around voice chat.

articles.title: What’s New in VALORANT Episode 2 Act III
articles.description: Reach for Radiant horizons on our new map Breeze, collect exclusive content in the latest Battlepass, and more.

articles.title: VALORANT Patch Notes 2.08
articles.description: Newest map Breeze and Coach slots highlight 2.08

articles.title: Breeze // Map Reveal - VALORANT
articles.description: Open spaces and long range engagements await on Breeze, landing in Act III.

articles.title: VALORANT Patch Notes 2.07
articles.description: Astra and Raze head to the shop, and an odd Viper bug gets fixed.

articles.title: VALORANT Patch Notes 33 ⅓: The Final Patch
articles.description: Mostly all new spring jokes.

articles.title: VALORANT Patch Notes 2.06
articles.description: Viper and Yoru changes crank the heat. Bucky is tweaked and HRTF audio arrives.

articles.title: VALORANT Patch Notes 2.05
articles.description: AFK detection and penalty updates, RR penalty for dodging ranked games, and a good number of bug fixes.

articles.title: What’s New in VALORANT Episode 2 Act II
articles.description: A fresh Battlepass, Astra drops in, Prime//2.0, and Competitive matchmaking updates.

articles.title: VALORANT Patch Notes 2.04
articles.description: Act II brings Astra, comprehensive Competitive matchmaking updates and Tactical Voice Over to help with call outs.

articles.title: VALORANT Patch Notes 2.03
articles.description: Yoru gets his first balance, Stinger is overhauled, and Escalation goes live.

articles.title: NEW VALORANT MODE: ESCALATION
articles.description: New VALORANT game mode Escalation arrives to test your skill with various weapons and abilities.

articles.title: VALORANT Patch Notes 2.02
articles.description: Running accuracy changes for rifles, Competitive system shifts, and needed bug fixes.

articles.title: Competitive Changes: 2.02 and what's next
articles.description: An in-depth look at the Competitive changes today and the rest of Episode 2.

articles.title: VALORANT Patch Notes 2.01
articles.description: Adjusted AFK restrictions, light Jett touches, and a major changes to Split.

articles.title: VALORANT Episode 2 Act I Competitive Changes
articles.description: Rank rewards, how does the Rank Rating work, and more on this EP2 Competitive breakdown.

articles.title: VALORANT Patch Notes 2.0
articles.description: New Episode, fresh updates. Yoru, Controller balance, a slew of Competitive changes and more.

articles.title: VALORANT Patch Notes 1.14
articles.description: Icebox gets its first overhaul, Sage’s Barrier Orb gets love, and lots of observer tool additions. Also, Night.Market and Snowball Fight!

articles.title: Wield your fate // Ion Skin Reveal Trailer - VALORANT
articles.description: Humanity’s last hope is in your hands.

articles.title: VALORANT Patch Notes 1.12
articles.description: Light day at the office this time around. Expect updates to the Observer, social panel and bug fixes.

articles.title: VALORANT Patch Notes 1.11
articles.description: This patch Skye enters the fray, Initiators and most Sentinel Agents get balanced, and the Economy ruleset is tuned.

articles.title: Act III Battlepass Trailer - VALORANT
articles.description: Welcome to the Act III Battlepass.

articles.title: VALORANT Patch Notes 1.10
articles.description: Icebox arrives to Unrated, Deathmatch improvements, and Competitive introduces server, select and tighter matchmaking.

articles.title: Skye // Agent Reveal Trailer - VALORANT
articles.description: Skye arrives Patch 1.11.

articles.title: What’s New in VALORANT Act III
articles.description: All the Act III releases and why you’re getting a new map early.

articles.title: Enter the Icebox // Map Reveal - VALORANT
articles.description: Dig your enemies a powdery grave in VALORANT’s new map, Icebox. Take on the tundra when Icebox drops with Act III.

articles.title: Act III Competitive Changes
articles.description: Game Director Joe Ziegler recruits the help of David Cole to map out the Competitive updates in Act III.

articles.title: VALORANT Patch Notes 1.09
articles.description: The Operator gets a makeover, Brimstone, Reyna, Omen, Viper, and Jett each get healthy updates.

articles.title: VALORANT Patch Notes 1.08
articles.description: Better map queue variety, Raze Blast Pack tuning, and a Guardian buff all in this round of patch notes.

articles.title: VALORANT Patch Notes 1.07
articles.description: You get the first Killjoy update, remake option, shotguns updates, and hit registration improvements.

articles.title: VALORANT Patch Notes 1.06
articles.description: Back from staycation, we have updates to all shotguns and some bug fixes

articles.title: What’s New in VALORANT Act II
articles.description: Fresh Battlepass, Killjoy arrives, Glitchpop, and a bevy of new ish.

articles.title: ACT II BATTLEPASS TRAILER - VALORANT
articles.description: Play VALORANT during Act II, earn XP and progress toward unlocking cosmetic items for your collection.

articles.title: VALORANT Patch Notes 1.05
articles.description: A slew of new in this patch: Killjoy, Act Ranks, Deathmatch (beta), and balance for Raze.

articles.title: Introducing Killjoy // New Agent Reveal Trailer - VALORANT
articles.description: Killjoy arrives in VALORANT Act II.

articles.title: VALORANT Patch Notes 1.04
articles.description: You get a Classic overhaul as well as balance for Viper, Brimstone, Raze and Cypher.

articles.title: VALORANT Patch Notes 1.03
articles.description: Guardian updates, Surrender Option, and a collection of QoL updates coming at you.

articles.title: VALORANT Patch Notes 1.02
articles.description: Competitive goes live! Also, a fresh Menu UI, surrender option, and balance for Viper, Jett, and Reyna.

articles.title: VALORANT Patch Notes 1.01
articles.description: New Orbs for Spike Rush, performance improvements, and bug fixes for Reyna and Cypher round out the notes.

articles.title: Spike Rush & New Game Modes
articles.description: Join Darkhorse and excal on a journey through Spike Rush and what to expect for new VALORANT game modes.

articles.title: What is the VALORANT Battlepass?
articles.description: David Cole, progression systems designer, talks VALORANT Act I Battlepass and how to unlock every item.

articles.title: Episode 1: Ignition // Official Launch Gameplay Trailer
articles.description: We put in work.  Watch the full official VALORANT launch gameplay trailer set on our newest map: Ascent.

articles.title: VALORANT Patch Notes 1.0
articles.description: New launch stuff! Also, major balance updates for 5 Agents, and  performance and hit registration improvements.

articles.title: 04: On Peeker’s Advantage & Ranked
articles.description: New week, new us, new topics.

articles.title: VALORANT Patch Notes 0.50
articles.description: Credit cap, ability cost adjustments, as well as important Agent and weapon updates are part of this beefy patch.

articles.title: 03: On in-game player behavior and server infrastructure
articles.description: We’re back this week with some commitments on player behavior and what’s going on with the servers.

articles.title: VALORANT Patch Notes 0.49
articles.description: QoL improvements for Phoenix, Observer mode, the Spike, and Competitive mode.

articles.title: 02: On Vanguard errors/solutions, gun skins, and agent progression
articles.description: Week two of our weekly updates, with today’s topics: Vanguard errors/solutions, gun skins, and agent progression.

articles.title: VALORANT Patch Notes 0.47+
articles.description: These lightweight patch notes bridge the alpha and closed beta.

articles.title: 01: On Raze and anti-cheat
articles.description: The first of our weekly status updates on the VALORANT Closed Beta, today featuring Raze and anti-cheat.

articles.title: VALORANT Asset Kit
articles.description: Check out the VALORANT closed beta asset kit and stream overlay!

opengraph.description: Riot Games presents VALORANT: a 5v5 character-based tactical FPS where precise gunplay meets unique agent abilities. Learn about VALORANT and its stylish cast
